channel.title: Cant connect to no-ip!
channel.description:
Hi,for some reason i cant get my no-ip working i run my no-ip...it loads the host ok i change the server ip in my source/client to mine. and when i click run i get error js 5 connect and i am running the server.
and also after i compile i get errors when trying to run the server... thanks and plz reply ;D

item.title: Cant connect to no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

if you are playing whilst your the host then your client ip should be set 127.0.0.1 and if other people are playing the client ip should be the 1 added in your no-ip host thing.

Read full topic
